content: There are no Super Stars. Obama was voted in by young Americans who like Sex and Drugs and have no street smarts. IMO people living with their parents should not be allowed to vote. Next you had all the Blacks voting for him simply because they wanted a brother in the Oval Office. OK they won now show me the change! Oh I have to wait 900 more days since the first 100 days are just too soon to see a difference. BS on that. All it takes for a person to be a good President is to just do one simple thing. What they promised to do when they were running for the office. How hard is that? Doesn't matter if your a democrat or Republican or even a Glenn Beck. All that said I do think Glenn Beck would make a great President.

content: quote: Originally posted by billbright: quote: Originally posted by OldUSAFSniper: Ahhhh the moderates. Definition of a moderate = Someone who believes in something so little that they change their stance based upon the direction of the wind... or the polls. Oklahoma... figures. Yep... no TARP money for the banks, they all turned it down in Oklahoma. Employment is up again this month. Car sales are up again. Legislature went Republican for the first time in 105 years. They're thinking of turning down the Stimulus money. And we just passed a law saying that unfunded mandates from the feds will not be adhered to. We have a constitutional amendment prohibiting same sex marriage; doesn't recognize any from any other state; we have concealed carry and make my day laws; we passed a law making employment of illegals a felony (60,000 left the state within a month); AND we're looking at a huge tax cut this year for corporations moving in from other states (we're ranked #2 in the US for business friendly places); AND we have more miles of lake shoreline than Minnesota. Makes for great bass fishing. And the best part? No freakin yankees...

content: Heads I win - Tails you lose REPUBLICANS:Advocate tax benefits loose regulations on commerce. = Keep the rich rich by allowing them to hold onto their money. DEMOCRATS:Advocate social services = Incentives for the poor to stay poor. It is human nature for people to take the path of least resistance especially when you grow up with welfare and food stamps as an example. Both parties create a division in economic classes. So while we fight each other over asinine differences, the people at the top of both parties laugh their way to the Swiss Bank UBS.

content: When did it become a crime to be successful in this Country? I worked hard all my life. I Enlisted, used my money to go to college, and got a Commission. First Commissioned Officer on either side of my family. Worked some good jobs, worked some bad ones too and now I have a decent career with decent pay on top of my Military service. So why should I have to give more of my hard earned treasure to the Government? I want my SUV, I like my SUV. I want my big apartment, I pay for it all too. I'm tired of paying for lazy bums to get hand outs. How about the dead @zzes get up off the block and work to better themselves and do like I did. If, I, the son of two school teachers from Indiana, can do it, anyone can. I'm with Beck, lets take a pitchfork to Washington.
